entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High 6.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or rain changing to periods of rain or drizzle this morning. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 near noon. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
